CmdLine: ARCH= && dpkgArch="$(dpkg --print-architecture)"   && case "${dpkgArch##*-}" in     amd64) ARCH='x64';;     ppc64el) ARCH='ppc64le';;     s390x) ARCH='s390x';;     arm64) ARCH='arm64';;     armhf) ARCH='armv7l';;     i386) ARCH='x86';;     *) echo "unsupported architecture"; exit 1 ;;   esac   && curl -SLO "https://nodejs.org/dist/v$NODE_VERSION/node-v$NODE_VERSION-linux-$ARCH.tar.xz"   && curl -SLO --compressed "https://nodejs.org/dist/v$NODE_VERSION/SHASUMS256.txt.asc"   && tar -xJf "node-v$NODE_VERSION-linux-$ARCH.tar.xz" -C /usr/local --strip-components=1 --no-same-owner   && ln -s /usr/local/bin/node /usr/local/bin/nodejs
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -eux;   curl -fSLO --compressed "https://yarnpkg.com/downloads/$YARN_VERSION/yarn-v$YARN_VERSION.tar.gz"   && curl -fSLO --compressed "https://yarnpkg.com/downloads/$YARN_VERSION/yarn-v$YARN_VERSION.tar.gz.asc"   && mkdir -p /opt/yarn   && tar -xzf yarn-v$YARN_VERSION.tar.gz -C /opt/yarn --strip-components=1   && ln -s /opt/yarn/bin/yarn /usr/local/bin/yarn   && ln -s /opt/yarn/bin/yarn /usr/local/bin/yarnpkg   && rm yarn-v$YARN_VERSION.tar.gz.asc yarn-v$YARN_VERSION.tar.gz
Commands.Name: run
